quest.name: Rusted Steel
journal: Stephanivien has word on the situation with Rostnsthal.

Stephanivien informs you that Joye and several of her colleagues have caught up to Rostnsthal. Fearing that the determined instructor will be difficult to stop, the chief machinist sends you along to aid in his detainment. Head to the Pillars and confront Rostnsthal.

You arrive at the scene to find Rostnsthal in a tense confrontation with several machinists. Joye bids you fire upon the instructor, and take the fight out of him before anyone is seriously hurt. Approach Rostnsthal, and wind him with a Gauss Round.

You beat Rostnsthal on the draw, and impress upon him the efficacy of his own instruction. Stephanivien arrives soon after, and convinces the pirate that giving himself up will solve nothing in the long term. Rostnsthal then shares with you the sins of his past, and demands to be given the chance to atone by helping you defeat Veri Selen. Return to the Skysteel Manufactory and speak with Stephanivien.

Stephanivien has informed Tedalgrinche of the manufactory's decision to face Veri Selen. Even with Rostnsthal's promised aid, however, he fears that this challenge will test you and your fellow machinists to your very limits. Make the most of the time remaining before the battle to hone your skills to a razor's edge.

※The next machinist quest will be available from Stephanivien upon reaching level 60.
objectives: Speak with Stephanivien at the Skysteel Manufactory.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: One of our machinists just returned to report on the situation with Rostnsthal. 'Twould seem that Joye and some few colleagues have caught up to him in the Pillars. Pray make your way to the scene, and persuade the instructor to stand down.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Joye and some few colleagues have caught up to Rostnsthal in the Pillars. Pray make your way to the scene, and persuade the instructor to stand down.

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: Forename! You've got to stop him!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Shoulda known ye'd be along... Now, back off afore I teach this student the meanin' o' “point-blank.”

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: I'm talkin' to you as well, Joye! Step aside!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: I bloody well will not step aside! Forename! Take the fight out of him with a Gauss Round, if you please!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: So that's 'ow it's gonna be, eh? Come on, then! We'll see who shoots who first!

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Back off afore I teach this student the meanin' o' “point-blank.”

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: ...Bloody 'ells, that was fast.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Your students ever strive to impress you, Rostnsthal.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: And 'tis thanks to Forename's diligence that I was able to once more improve the tools of our trade.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Even Veri Selen cannot stand against the advances we have made in both technique and technology! You must have faith that our machinists will prevail.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: And though I appreciate your eagerness to occupy a cell on my behalf, such a sacrifice will not halt Tedalgrinche's crusade against the manufactory.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Aye... Ye might be right about that.

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: He's right about more than just that─you've got to stop underestimatin' what we're capable of.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! I keep forgettin' what a stubborn lot I'm dealin' with─yer the ones what're challengin' the very stones what Ishgard was built on.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: Alright, I won't give meself up...on one condition.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: All talk o' contracts aside, ye let me 'elp in the fight against this Veri Selen nightmare.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: You have always sought to avoid such entanglements before... What has changed?

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: It's a matter o' penance. Back when I was still in charge o' the 'Cudas, I lied to me subordinates─instead o' servin' the thalassocracy, I 'ad them lads workin' to further me own agenda. It all came apart, though, when I sent a glut of 'em off to die in a battle they 'ad no business bein' in...

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: I 'ad me eyes on the Admiral's chair, see, but what kind o' Admiral would do that? It was reckless an' selfish, an' got a lot o' good people killed. After they stripped me o' me rank, I drowned meself in drink, an' took up the life o' the worst kind o' pirate.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: That soldier I tried to visit in Camp Overlook? 'E was one o' me lads what survived.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: I've been sendin' 'im every coin I can spare to pay back me bloody debt, but there ain't enough gelt in the world what could buy off me guilt.

dialogue.name: ROSTNSTHAL
dialogue.text: An' now, years later, I see a chance to undo the wrong I've done. A bunch o' me students plan to charge into a situation they got no business bein' in, an' I plan to see 'em come out of it alive!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Well, then! Consider yourself invited to the battle!

dialogue.name: JOYE
dialogue.text: Come, lead us in a pre-battle drill, Rostnsthal!

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Once more your skill at firearms has rescued the manufactory from peril! Let us head back there, shall we?

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, there you are. I have sent word of our decision to Tedalgrinche.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Even with the instructor's added firepower, however, I fear this challenge will test us to our very limits.

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN

dialogue.name: STEPHANIVIEN
dialogue.text: Rostnsthal has vowed to stay with us─regardless of the term of his contract─until the sins of his past have been washed away in Veri Selen's blood. Let us then take advantage of every moment we have from now until the battle to hone our skills to a razor's edge!
